definition: to carry (on one's person)/to support (old)/Taiwan pr. [xi1 dai4]
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
(medicine) carrier (of a recessive gene, virus etc)

sentences.english: Virus-infected emails struck fear into the Microsoft Company.
sentences.chinese: 攜帶病毒的電子郵件引起了微軟公司的恐慌。

sentences.english: It looks like I'm missing one of my carry-ons from the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我好像在飛機上丟失了一件隨身攜帶的行李。

sentences.english: Adenoviruses have been modified to carry parts of the HIV virus.
sentences.chinese: 腺病毒經過改良以攜帶HIV病毒部件。

sentences.english: Small and portable, the iron cauldron was once used as a field cauldron, according to experts.
sentences.chinese: 據專家介紹鐵釜是一種行軍鍋，它體積小，便於攜帶。

sentences.english: In the Empire, a standard Dreadnaught carried a squadron of TIE fighters.
sentences.chinese: 在帝國，一艘標準的無畏級攜帶一箇中隊的鈦戰鬥機。

sentences.english: Into the camp, blood tests found Lee's living with HIV in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 進勞教所時，抽血化驗查出李的血液中攜帶艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: The question is how much intensity does the specific infraction carry.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題有多少的具體違規攜帶強度。

sentences.english: The hair beautification comb which is convenient to carry does not easily pollute skin or clothing.
sentences.chinese: 該髮梳攜帶方便，不污染皮膚或衣物。

sentences.english: Objective The conditions of Ceratopogonidae carried by entry international ocean ships were determined.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解入境國際航行船舶攜帶輸入性蠓類的情況。

sentences.english: How many tax-free cigarettes and wines can I take if I travel to UK?3.
sentences.chinese: 叨教可以免稅攜帶多少香菸和酒？

sentences.english: The armored bring along and ammo box to support him and his allies.
sentences.chinese: 攜帶彈藥箱支援他和他的盟友。

sentences.english: The helicopter can carry up to eight missiles under the stub wings for anti-armour role.
sentences.chinese: 直升飛機能爲反裝甲任務在短翼下攜帶八枚導彈。

sentences.english: Can migratory birds carry H5N1 over long distances?
sentences.chinese: 候鳥會長距離攜帶H5N1型禽流感病毒嗎？

sentences.english: Marvin always carried a knife, never a gun.
sentences.chinese: 馬文總是隨身攜帶一把刀，從不帶手槍。

sentences.english: In addition, a compact Canon G11 camera is always with me.
sentences.chinese: 此外我隨身攜帶一部佳能G11小型相機。

sentences.english: The researchers are also developing portable versions.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員正在開發可攜帶版本。
